医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
员工倦怠会给公司带来巨大的财务损失根据《美国预防医学杂志》上发表的一项研究，员工的倦怠可能每年为公司造成数百万美元的损失，每位员工每位员工每位员工约4,000至21,000美元不等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/employee-burnout-leads-to-significant-financial-financial-losses-for-companies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/employee-burnout-leads-to-significant-financial-financial-losses-for-companies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6e8e5ca-c6db-4fbd-b5d7-561fd8642226 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 00:44:30 -0500 Employee burnout leads to significant financial losses for companies
新发现阐明了探戈2缺乏儿童的能源危机研究与罕见，严重疾病有关的蛋白质的研究人员已经发现了一个发现，阐明了在严重的代谢危机中如何满足其能量需求的发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/new-discovery-sheds-light-on-energy-energy-crisis-in-crisis-in-children-with-tango2-deficitigy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/new-discovery-sheds-light-on-energy-energy-crisis-crisis-in-crisis-in-children-with-with-tango2-deficitigy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64c5cf59-80b5-4e7777-8133-a9f17ef098c7 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 00:39:12 -0500 New discovery sheds light on energy crisis in children with TANGO2 deficiency
研究揭示了空气污染如何促进阿尔茨海默氏病空气污染每年造成近700万个过早死亡，其影响远远超出了肺部。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/study-reveals-how-air-pollution-contributes-to-alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/study-reveals-how-air-pollution-contributes-to-alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=768C4ADA-F362-4E6E-BAF5-83DB329B5750 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 00:23:30 -0500 Study reveals how air pollution contributes to Alzheimer's disease
UCSF研究表明肺是造血干细胞的来源红细胞从肺部携带氧气到其他每个器官，并且形成血液的干细胞每天必须制造约2000亿新的红细胞，以保持氧气流动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/ucsf-study-reveals-lungs-as-source-of-hematopoietic-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250228/ucsf-study-reveals-lungs-as-source-of-hematopoietic-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8A5AB8C-44FC-4B69-9FC3-CB6E172FE3B1 Fri, 28 Feb 2025 00:07:04 -0500 UCSF study reveals lungs as source of hematopoietic stem cells
受过训练的免疫力可能加剧炎症性骨质流失障碍临床研究长期以来一直集中在利用免疫系统作用的方法上。从疫苗到免疫疗法，研究人员都使用对免疫系统的了解来开发疗法，以治疗或预防流感疾病到自身免疫性疾病和癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/ trained-mmunity-may-may-exacerbate----------------- may-may-exacerbate-bone-bone-bone-loss-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/trained-immunity-may-may-exacerbate-inflammatoration-bone-bone-loss-loss-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5D84834B-6DA4-4BFD-A728-028-0F08B1468189 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 23:37:53 -0500 Trained immunity may exacerbate inflammatory bone loss disorders

研究用于李斯特氏病疫苗的李斯特菌菌株的遗传差异宣布了《人畜共患杂志》的新文章出版物。李斯特氏病是影响动物和人类的最严重的食物传播疾病之一，它对公共卫生，动物福利和食品行业构成了严重威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/investigating-genetic-differences-in-listeria-strains-used-for-listeriosis-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/investigating-genetic-differences-in-listeria-strains-strains-used-for-listeriosis-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c443fe0-4427-4427-4974-942a-ad1d62222bc0a7 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 21:46:00 -0500 Investigating genetic differences in Listeria strains used for listeriosis vaccine

新框架旨在加速纳米医学的开发纳米医学可以挽救生命，但它们不能足够快地进入市场或患者的身体。现在，研究人员提出了一种食谱来加速和改善过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/new-framework-aims-to-accelerate-nanomedicine-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/new-framework-aims-to-accelerate-nanomedicine-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33626240-E213-4371-9507-5D08F5B95865 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 21:37:00 -0500 New framework aims to accelerate nanomedicine development
